channel.description: Recent content in CCPA on Jordan's blog

item.title: Global Privacy Control w.r.t GDPR
item.description: Intro to GPC and GDPR The [Global Privacy Control (GPC)] is a great idea, in the same way do-not-track was a great idea. A consistent method for people to opt out of data sharing everywhere. People should after all have a simple and straight forward way to opt out of data sharing. But as evidenced by do-not-track that’s not enough. The GPC despite the ‘Global’ in the name is particularly narrowly targeted.
